inclusion.criterion: History of known coronary artery disease
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unstable angina or myocardial infarction by history, ECG, and/or enzymatic criteria within 1 month of enrollment.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Left ventricular dysfunction as defined by an left ventricular ejection fraction documented as < 45% within 1 year of enrollment by an echocardiogram, MRI, or nuclear imaging.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CLL and large cell transformation, with recent worsening palpable lymphadenopathy. He has had multiple treatment regimens without significant response.
